Bracelet.title: Bracelet
Bracelet.description: Represents a medical emergency bracelet, which is the core entity managed by users.

pin.description: PIN associated with the bracelet for public verification.

userId.description: Reference to the UserProfile who owns this bracelet. Null if unclaimed.

name.description: Name of the person or pet for the profile.

privacy.description: Privacy setting for the profile (public or private).

profileType.description: Type of profile, e.g., 'person' or 'pet'. Null if unconfigured.

definition.description: Stores user-specific data, not directly manipulated by the main forms. Security rules should ensure only the authenticated user can access their own document.
Stores all bracelets. This is the primary collection for the application's core logic.

params.name: braceletId
params.description: The unique identifier for the bracelet.

firestore.reasoning: The structure is simplified to focus on the `bracelets` collection, which is the core of the application's functionality. The `/users/{userId}` path is kept for user-specific data that might be needed for app settings or metadata, protected by strict security rules. All profile data is now consolidated under the `Bracelet` entity, which simplifies data management and security rule logic.
